subject: Baseball
Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant (Japan)
Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
lead_paragraph: The Soso Rengo team, a combination of players from three high schools just miles from the crippled nuclear reactors in Fukushima, lost in the opening round of a regional knock-out contest.
snippet: The Soso Rengo team, a combination of players from three high schools just miles from the crippled nuclear reactors in Fukushima, lost in the opening round of a regional knock-out contest.
